SEARCH
Package com.project.src.accountManager

Interface Actions

All Known Implementing Classes:
DBManager
public interface Actions
Interface to manage account actions. This interface defines the essential methods for handling user account operations such as logging in, registering, and updating user-specific lists.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Angelo Ripamonti invalid input: '&' Luca Avveduto

  • Method Details

    • login

      Account login(String username, String psw) throws AccessException
      Logs into an account.
      Parameters:
      username - the account username
      psw - the account password
      Returns:
      the logged-in account
      Throws:
      AccessException - if the credentials are incorrect

    • register

      boolean register(Account acc) throws UsernameException
      Registers a new account.
      Parameters:
      acc - the account to register
      Returns:
      true if the registration is completed successfully
      Throws:
      UsernameException - if the username already exists

    • updateList

      void updateList(Account acc)
      Updates the user's list of expenses.
      Parameters:
      acc - the account whose expense list is to be updated

    • getExpensesByAccount

      ArrayList<ExpenseController> getExpensesByAccount(Account acc)
      Retrieves the account details for a given account.
      Parameters:
      acc - the account whose expenses are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the list of expenses associated with the account

    • deleteAccount

      void deleteAccount(Account acc)
      Deletes an account.
      Parameters:
      acc - the account to be deleted
